title: Cats and Dogs Welcome! We are Pet Friendly! 2 BD / 2 BA

apartments are also located right down the street from the Northshore Mall and plenty of great dining spots.', 'Our apartments feature private balconies or patios, central air-conditioning, sprawling closets and in-unit washer and dryers.', 'Residents can also take advantage of our unparalleled amenities, such as the landscaped barbecue and picnic area, playground and resort style pool.', 'Plus,
